name: Mortals and Monsters: Blood Orc
description:
A tower defense game by WandCast Games. Battle armies of orcs, goblins and undead in a desperate bid for survival across 22 challenging levels.

Design a maze to confound your foes. Destroy them with towering defenses. Control the battle with your powers.

Save your people from the ancient and evil Blood Orc!

A game by two people.
